name: One Man's Sky
description:
You crashed on an asteroid while mining for materials, and you must get back to earth while simultaneously becoming a rich capitalist pig who owns the earth with so much fervor and privatized industrial horror that the planet explodes.

Game by me (Gavin Capenos), music by Dan McClay + Brian Luft helped w/sfx

Built exclusively for the FW1S SNES USB controller. Its horrible.

https://www.aliexpress.com/item/FW1S-SNES-USB-Clas...
